rev.desc.rev.desc: Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

removed the substring that created the $year variable and replaced it with the year() function to return whatever year in the date format selected by the user. This was done on the calc panel to correct the wrong year being used if the client has is using the 4 digit year.

descript.descript: Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

removed the substring that created the $year variable and replaced it with the year() function to return whatever year in the date format selected by the user. This was done on the calc panel to correct the wrong year being used if the client has is using the 4 digit year.
